com.software.reuze

Class gb_SurfaceMeshBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_SurfaceMeshBuilder

  • public class gb_SurfaceMeshBuilder
extends Object
    An extensible builder class for gb_TriangleMeshes based on 3D surface functions using spherical coordinates. In order to create mesh, you'll need to supply a gb_i_SurfaceFunction implementation to the builder.
